text: Burr Ridge (formerly Harvester) is a village in Illinois and a suburb of Chicago, in Cook and DuPage counties, Illinois, United States. The village is one of the richest towns in Illinois. It is locally known for its large beautiful mansions. The population was 11,192 at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *Village of Burr Ridge official website Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Villages in Illinois Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois Category:Settlements in DuPage County, Illinois
title: Burr Ridge, Illinois
